+ ### 2.1 åˆ›å»ºè¿ç§»æ ‡ç­¾
+ ```sql

+ -- ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªåˆ†ç»„åˆ›å»ºå¯¹åº”æ ‡ç­¾
+ INSERT INTO tags (name, color, userId)

+   CONCAT('ğŸ“‹ ', s.name) as name,
+   '#6b7280' as color,
+   p.userId
+ FROM sections s

+ ```

+ ### 2.2 è¿ç§»ä»»åŠ¡å…³è”
+ ```sql

+ JOIN projects p ON t.projectId = p.id
+ JOIN tags tag ON tag.name = CONCAT('ğŸ“ ', p.name) AND tag.userId = p.userId
+ WHERE t.projectId IS NOT NULL;
+ 
+ -- ä¸ºä»»åŠ¡æ·»åŠ åˆ†ç»„æ ‡ç­¾
+ INSERT INTO task_tags (taskId, tagId)
+ SELECT t.id, tag.id
+ FROM tasks t
+ JOIN sections s ON t.sectionId = s.id
+ JOIN projects p ON s.projectId = p.id
+ JOIN tags tag ON tag.name = CONCAT('ğŸ“‹ ', s.name) AND tag.userId = p.userId
+ WHERE t.sectionId IS NOT NULL;
+ ```
+ 
+ ### 2.3 æ•°æ®éªŒè¯
+ - éªŒè¯æ‰€æœ‰ä»»åŠ¡éƒ½æœ‰å¯¹åº”æ ‡ç­¾
+ - éªŒè¯æ ‡ç­¾æ•°é‡æ­£ç¡®
+ - éªŒè¯ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®å®Œæ•´æ€§
+ 
+ ## ğŸ”§ ç¬¬ä¸‰é˜¶æ®µï¼šæ•°æ®åº“ç»“æ„æ›´æ–°
+ 
+ ### 3.1 ç§»é™¤å­—æ®µ
+ ```sql
+ -- ç§»é™¤ Task è¡¨çš„é¡¹ç›®å’Œåˆ†ç»„å­—æ®µ

+ ```typescript

+ ## ğŸ“± ç¬¬äº”é˜¶æ®µï¼šUI/UX é‡æ„

+ ### 5.2 ä»»åŠ¡åˆ—è¡¨ä¼˜åŒ–

```diff
+ import { PrismaClient } from '@prisma/client'

+ const prisma = new PrismaClient()
+ 
+ async function migrateProjectsAndSectionsToTags() {
+   console.log('ğŸš€ å¼€å§‹æ•°æ®è¿ç§»ï¼šé¡¹ç›®å’Œåˆ†ç»„ â†’ æ ‡ç­¾')
+   
+   try {
+     // 1. æ•°æ®å¤‡ä»½å’ŒéªŒè¯
+     console.log('ğŸ“Š æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡ï¼š')
+     const stats = await gatherStats()
+     console.log(`- ç”¨æˆ·æ•°: ${stats.users}`)
+     console.log(`- é¡¹ç›®æ•°: ${stats.projects}`)
+     console.log(`- åˆ†ç»„æ•°: ${stats.sections}`)
+     console.log(`- ä»»åŠ¡æ•°: ${stats.tasks}`)
+     console.log(`- ç°æœ‰æ ‡ç­¾æ•°: ${stats.tags}`)
+     
+     // 2. åˆ›å»ºé¡¹ç›®æ ‡ç­¾
+     console.log('\nğŸ“ åˆ›å»ºé¡¹ç›®æ ‡ç­¾...')
+     const projectTags = await createProjectTags()
+     console.log(`âœ… åˆ›å»ºäº† ${projectTags.length} ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®æ ‡ç­¾`)
+     
+     // 3. åˆ›å»ºåˆ†ç»„æ ‡ç­¾
+     console.log('\nğŸ“‹ åˆ›å»ºåˆ†ç»„æ ‡ç­¾...')
+     const sectionTags = await createSectionTags()
+     console.log(`âœ… åˆ›å»ºäº† ${sectionTags.length} ä¸ªåˆ†ç»„æ ‡ç­¾`)
+     
+     // 4. ä¸ºä»»åŠ¡æ·»åŠ é¡¹ç›®æ ‡ç­¾å…³è”
+     console.log('\nğŸ”— æ·»åŠ ä»»åŠ¡-é¡¹ç›®æ ‡ç­¾å…³è”...')
+     const projectTagLinks = await linkTasksToProjectTags()
+     console.log(`âœ… åˆ›å»ºäº† ${projectTagLinks} ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®æ ‡ç­¾å…³è”`)
+     
+     // 5. ä¸ºä»»åŠ¡æ·»åŠ åˆ†ç»„æ ‡ç­¾å…³è”
+     console.log('\nğŸ”— æ·»åŠ ä»»åŠ¡-åˆ†ç»„æ ‡ç­¾å…³è”...')
+     const sectionTagLinks = await linkTasksToSectionTags()
+     console.log(`âœ… åˆ›å»ºäº† ${sectionTagLinks} ä¸ªåˆ†ç»„æ ‡ç­¾å…³è”`)
+     
+     // 6. éªŒè¯è¿ç§»ç»“æœ
+     console.log('\nğŸ” éªŒè¯è¿ç§»ç»“æœ...')
+     const validationResult = await validateMigration()
+     console.log('âœ… éªŒè¯å®Œæˆ')
+     console.log(`- ä»»åŠ¡æ€»æ•°: ${validationResult.totalTasks}`)
+     console.log(`- æœ‰æ ‡ç­¾çš„ä»»åŠ¡: ${validationResult.tasksWithTags}`)
+     console.log(`- æ ‡ç­¾æ€»æ•°: ${validationResult.totalTags}`)
+     
+     console.log('\nğŸ‰ æ•°æ®è¿ç§»å®Œæˆï¼')
+     console.log('ğŸ’¡ è¯·æ£€æŸ¥æ•°æ®å®Œæ•´æ€§ï¼Œç¡®è®¤æ— è¯¯åå¯ä»¥æ‰§è¡Œä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥ï¼šç§»é™¤é¡¹ç›®å’Œåˆ†ç»„ç»“æ„')

+     console.error('âŒ è¿ç§»å¤±è´¥:', error)

+ async function gatherStats() {
+   const [users, projects, sections, tasks, tags] = await Promise.all([
+     prisma.user.count(),
+     prisma.project.count(),
+     prisma.section.count(),
+     prisma.task.count(),
+     prisma.tag.count()
+   ])
+   
+   return { users, projects, sections, tasks, tags }
+ }
+ 
+ async function createProjectTags() {
+   // è·å–æ‰€æœ‰éå½’æ¡£é¡¹ç›®
+   const projects = await prisma.project.findMany({
+     where: { isArchived: false },
+     select: { id: true, name: true, color: true, userId: true }
+   })
+   
+   const projectTags = []
+   
+   for (const project of projects) {
+     const tagName = `ğŸ“ ${project.name}`
+     
+     // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å·²å­˜åœ¨åŒåæ ‡ç­¾
+     const existingTag = await prisma.tag.findFirst({
+       where: {
+         name: tagName,
+         userId: project.userId
+       }
+     })
+     
+     if (!existingTag) {
+       const tag = await prisma.tag.create({
+         data: {
+           name: tagName,
+           color: project.color,
+           userId: project.userId
+         }
+       })
+       projectTags.push(tag)
+     } else {
+       projectTags.push(existingTag)
+     }
+   }
+   
+   return projectTags
+ }
+ 
+ async function createSectionTags() {
+   // è·å–æ‰€æœ‰åˆ†ç»„
+   const sections = await prisma.section.findMany({
+     include: {
+       project: {
+         select: { userId: true, isArchived: true }
+       }
+     },
+     where: {
+       project: {
+         isArchived: false
+       }
+     }
+   })
+   
+   const sectionTags = []
+   
+   for (const section of sections) {
+     const tagName = `ğŸ“‹ ${section.name}`
+     
+     // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å·²å­˜åœ¨åŒåæ ‡ç­¾
+     const existingTag = await prisma.tag.findFirst({
+       where: {
+         name: tagName,
+         userId: section.project.userId
+       }
+     })
+     
+     if (!existingTag) {
+       const tag = await prisma.tag.create({
+         data: {
+           name: tagName,
+           color: '#6b7280', // é»˜è®¤ç°è‰²
+           userId: section.project.userId
+         }
+       })
+       sectionTags.push(tag)
+     } else {
+       sectionTags.push(existingTag)
+     }
+   }
+   
+   return sectionTags
+ }
+ 
+ async function linkTasksToProjectTags() {
+   // è·å–æ‰€æœ‰æœ‰é¡¹ç›®çš„ä»»åŠ¡
+   const tasksWithProjects = await prisma.task.findMany({
+     where: { projectId: { not: null } },
+     include: {
+       project: {
+         select: { name: true, userId: true }
+       }
+     }
+   })
+   
+   let linkCount = 0
+   
+   for (const task of tasksWithProjects) {
+     if (!task.project) continue
+     
+     const tagName = `ğŸ“ ${task.project.name}`
+     
+     // æ‰¾åˆ°å¯¹åº”çš„é¡¹ç›®æ ‡ç­¾
+     const projectTag = await prisma.tag.findFirst({
+       where: {
+         name: tagName,
+         userId: task.project.userId
+       }
+     })
+     
+     if (projectTag) {
+       // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å·²å­˜åœ¨å…³è”
+       const existingLink = await prisma.taskTag.findFirst({
+         where: {
+           taskId: task.id,
+           tagId: projectTag.id
+         }
+       })
+       
+       if (!existingLink) {
+         await prisma.taskTag.create({
+           data: {
+             taskId: task.id,
+             tagId: projectTag.id
+           }
+         })
+         linkCount++
+       }
+     }
+   }
+   
+   return linkCount
+ }
+ 
+ async function linkTasksToSectionTags() {
+   // è·å–æ‰€æœ‰æœ‰åˆ†ç»„çš„ä»»åŠ¡
+   const tasksWithSections = await prisma.task.findMany({
+     where: { sectionId: { not: null } },
+     include: {
+       section: {
+         select: { name: true },
+         include: {
+           project: {
+             select: { userId: true }
+           }
+         }
+       }
+     }
+   })
+   
+   let linkCount = 0
+   
+   for (const task of tasksWithSections) {
+     if (!task.section) continue
+     
+     const tagName = `ğŸ“‹ ${task.section.name}`
+     
+     // æ‰¾åˆ°å¯¹åº”çš„åˆ†ç»„æ ‡ç­¾
+     const sectionTag = await prisma.tag.findFirst({
+       where: {
+         name: tagName,
+         userId: task.section.project.userId
+       }
+     })
+     
+     if (sectionTag) {
+       // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å·²å­˜åœ¨å…³è”
+       const existingLink = await prisma.taskTag.findFirst({
+         where: {
+           taskId: task.id,
+           tagId: sectionTag.id
+         }
+       })
+       
+       if (!existingLink) {
+         await prisma.taskTag.create({
+           data: {
+             taskId: task.id,
+             tagId: sectionTag.id
+           }
+         })
+         linkCount++
+       }
+     }
+   }
+   
+   return linkCount
+ }
+ 
+ async function validateMigration() {
+   const [totalTasks, tasksWithTags, totalTags] = await Promise.all([
+     prisma.task.count(),
+     prisma.task.count({
+       where: {
+         taskTags: {
+           some: {}
+         }
+       }
+     }),
+     prisma.tag.count()
+   ])
+   
+   return { totalTasks, tasksWithTags, totalTags }
+ }
+ 
+ async function rollbackMigration() {
+   console.log('ğŸ”„ å¼€å§‹å›æ»šè¿ç§»...')
+   
+   try {
+     // åˆ é™¤é¡¹ç›®æ ‡ç­¾
+     await prisma.tag.deleteMany({
+       where: {
+         name: { startsWith: 'ğŸ“ ' }
+       }
+     })
+     
+     // åˆ é™¤åˆ†ç»„æ ‡ç­¾
+     await prisma.tag.deleteMany({
+       where: {
+         name: { startsWith: 'ğŸ“‹ ' }
+       }
+     })
+     
+     console.log('âœ… å›æ»šå®Œæˆ')
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('âŒ å›æ»šå¤±è´¥:', error)
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // ä¸»å‡½æ•°
+ async function main() {
+   const args = process.argv.slice(2)
+   const command = args[0]
+   
+   if (command === 'rollback') {
+     await rollbackMigration()
+   } else {
+     await migrateProjectsAndSectionsToTags()
+   }
+   
+   await prisma.$disconnect()
+ }
+ 
+ main().catch((error) => {
+   console.error('ğŸ’¥ è„šæœ¬æ‰§è¡Œå¤±è´¥:', error)
+   process.exit(1)
+ }) 
```

## ğŸ“‹ **å½“å‰æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½åˆ†æ**

å½“å‰ç³»ç»Ÿæœ‰åŸºç¡€æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œä½†æ¯”è¾ƒåˆ†æ•£ä¸”åŠŸèƒ½æœ‰é™ã€‚æˆ‘æ¥å®ç°ä¸€ä¸ªå¼ºå¤§çš„å¤åˆæœç´¢ç³»ç»Ÿã€‚

é¦–å…ˆåˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå¢å¼ºçš„æœç´¢ç»„ä»¶æ¥æ›¿æ¢ Header ä¸­çš„ç®€å•æœç´¢ï¼š

---

```diff
- 
+ 'use client'
+ 
+ import { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'
+ import { Search, Filter, X, Calendar, Tag, Flag, Clock, ChevronDown } from 'lucide-react'
+ import { api } from '@/lib/api'
+ import { TagWithDetails } from '@/types'
+ 
+ interface SearchFilters {
+   query?: string
+   tagIds?: string[]
+   priority?: string
+   isCompleted?: boolean
+   dueDateFrom?: string
+   dueDateTo?: string
+   createdFrom?: string
+   createdTo?: string
+ }
+ 
+ interface SearchBarProps {
+   onSearch: (filters: SearchFilters) => void
+   onClear: () => void
+ }
+ 
+ export default function SearchBar({ onSearch, onClear }: SearchBarProps) {
+   const [query, setQuery] = useState('')
+   const [showFilters, setShowFilters] = useState(false)
+   const [tags, setTags] = useState<TagWithDetails[]>([])
+   const [selectedTagIds, setSelectedTagIds] = useState<string[]>([])
+   const [selectedPriority, setSelectedPriority] = useState('')
+   const [selectedStatus, setSelectedStatus] = useState('')
+   const [dueDateFrom, setDueDateFrom] = useState('')
+   const [dueDateTo, setDueDateTo] = useState('')
+   const [createdFrom, setCreatedFrom] = useState('')
+   const [createdTo, setCreatedTo] = useState('')
+   const [hasActiveFilters, setHasActiveFilters] = useState(false)
+   
+   const searchRef = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null)
+ 
+   useEffect(() => {
+     fetchTags()
+   }, [])
+ 
+   useEffect(() => {
+     const active = selectedTagIds.length > 0 || 
+                    selectedPriority || 
+                    selectedStatus || 
+                    dueDateFrom || 
+                    dueDateTo || 
+                    createdFrom || 
+                    createdTo
+     setHasActiveFilters(active)
+   }, [selectedTagIds, selectedPriority, selectedStatus, dueDateFrom, dueDateTo, createdFrom, createdTo])
+ 
+   const fetchTags = async () => {
+     try {
+       const data = await api.getTags()
+       setTags(data)
+     } catch (err) {
+       console.error('è·å–æ ‡ç­¾å¤±è´¥:', err)
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   const handleSearch = () => {
+     const filters: SearchFilters = {}
+     
+     if (query.trim()) filters.query = query.trim()
+     if (selectedTagIds.length > 0) filters.tagIds = selectedTagIds
+     if (selectedPriority) filters.priority = selectedPriority
+     if (selectedStatus === 'completed') filters.isCompleted = true
+     if (selectedStatus === 'pending') filters.isCompleted = false
+     if (dueDateFrom) filters.dueDateFrom = dueDateFrom
+     if (dueDateTo) filters.dueDateTo = dueDateTo
+     if (createdFrom) filters.createdFrom = createdFrom
+     if (createdTo) filters.createdTo = createdTo
+ 
+     onSearch(filters)
+   }
+ 
+   const handleClear = () => {
+     setQuery('')
+     setSelectedTagIds([])
+     setSelectedPriority('')
+     setSelectedStatus('')
+     setDueDateFrom('')
+     setDueDateTo('')
+     setCreatedFrom('')
+     setCreatedTo('')
+     setShowFilters(false)
+     onClear()
+   }
+ 
+   const handleTagToggle = (tagId: string) => {
+     setSelectedTagIds(prev => 
+       prev.includes(tagId) 
+         ? prev.filter(id => id !== tagId)
+         : [...prev, tagId]
+     )
+   }
+ 
+   const handleKeyPress = (e: React.KeyboardEvent) => {
+     if (e.key === 'Enter') {
+       handleSearch()
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   // ç‚¹å‡»å¤–éƒ¨å…³é—­è¿‡æ»¤å™¨
+   useEffect(() => {
+     const handleClickOutside = (event: MouseEvent) => {
+       if (searchRef.current && !searchRef.current.contains(event.target as Node)) {
+         setShowFilters(false)
+       }
+     }
+ 
+     document.addEventListener('mousedown', handleClickOutside)
+     return () => document.removeEventListener('mousedown', handleClickOutside)
+   }, [])
+ 
+   return (
+     <div ref={searchRef} className="relative">
+       {/* æœç´¢ä¸»ä½“ */}
+       <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">
+         <div className="relative flex-1">
+           <Search className="absolute left-3 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 text-gray-400 h-4 w-4" />
+           <input
+             type="text"
+             placeholder="æœç´¢ä»»åŠ¡..."
+             value={query}
+             onChange={(e) => setQuery(e.target.value)}
+             onKeyPress={handleKeyPress}
+             className="pl-10 pr-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg w-full focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500"
+           />
+         </div>
+         
+         <button
+           onClick={() => setShowFilters(!showFilters)}
+           className={`p-2 border rounded-lg transition-colors ${
+             hasActiveFilters || showFilters
+               ? 'bg-blue-50 border-blue-300 text-blue-600'
+               : 'border-gray-300 text-gray-500 hover:bg-gray-50'
+           }`}
+         >
+           <Filter className="h-4 w-4" />
+         </button>
+ 
+         {(query || hasActiveFilters) && (
+           <button
+             onClick={handleClear}
+             className="p-2 text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700"
+           >
+             <X className="h-4 w-4" />
+           </button>
+         )}
+ 
+         <button
+           onClick={handleSearch}
+           className="px-4 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors"
+         >
+           æœç´¢
+         </button>
+       </div>
+ 
+       {/* è¿‡æ»¤å™¨é¢æ¿ */}
+       {showFilters && (
+         <div className="absolute top-full left-0 right-0 mt-2 bg-white border border-gray-200 rounded-lg shadow-lg z-50 p-4">
+           <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
+             {/* æ ‡ç­¾è¿‡æ»¤ */}
+             <div>
+               <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-2">
+                 <Tag className="inline h-4 w-4 mr-1" />
+                 æ ‡ç­¾
+               </label>
+               <div className="max-h-32 overflow-y-auto border border-gray-200 rounded-lg p-2">
+                 {tags.map((tag) => (
+                   <label key={tag.id} className="flex items-center space-x-2 py-1 cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-50 px-2 rounded">
+                     <input
+                       type="checkbox"
+                       checked={selectedTagIds.includes(tag.id)}
+                       onChange={() => handleTagToggle(tag.id)}
+                       className="rounded border-gray-300 text-blue-600 focus:ring-blue-500"
+                     />
+                     <div
+                       className="w-3 h-3 rounded-full"
+                       style={{ backgroundColor: tag.color }}
+                     />
+                     <span className="text-sm">{tag.name}</span>
+                   </label>
+                 ))}
+               </div>
+             </div>
+ 
+             {/* ä¼˜å…ˆçº§è¿‡æ»¤ */}
+             <div>
+               <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-2">
+                 <Flag className="inline h-4 w-4 mr-1" />
+                 ä¼˜å…ˆçº§
+               </label>
+               <select
+                 value={selectedPriority}
+                 onChange={(e) => setSelectedPriority(e.target.value)}
+                 className="w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-lg px-3 py-2 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500"
+               >
+                 <option value="">æ‰€æœ‰ä¼˜å…ˆçº§</option>
+                 <option value="URGENT">ç´§æ€¥</option>
+                 <option value="HIGH">é«˜</option>
+                 <option value="MEDIUM">ä¸­</option>
+                 <option value="LOW">ä½</option>
+               </select>
+             </div>
+ 
+             {/* çŠ¶æ€è¿‡æ»¤ */}
+             <div>
+               <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-2">
+                 <Clock className="inline h-4 w-4 mr-1" />
+                 çŠ¶æ€
+               </label>
+               <select
+                 value={selectedStatus}
+                 onChange={(e) => setSelectedStatus(e.target.value)}
+                 className="w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-lg px-3 py-2 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500"
+               >
+                 <option value="">æ‰€æœ‰çŠ¶æ€</option>
+                 <option value="pending">å¾…åŠ</option>
+                 <option value="completed">å·²å®Œæˆ</option>
+               </select>
+             </div>
+ 
+             {/* æˆªæ­¢æ—¥æœŸè¿‡æ»¤ */}
+             <div>
+               <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-2">
+                 <Calendar className="inline h-4 w-4 mr-1" />
+                 æˆªæ­¢æ—¥æœŸ
+               </label>
+               <div className="space-y-2">
+                 <input
+                   type="date"
+                   value={dueDateFrom}
+                   onChange={(e) => setDueDateFrom(e.target.value)}
+                   placeholder="å¼€å§‹æ—¥æœŸ"
+                   className="w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-lg px-3 py-2 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500"
+                 />
+                 <input
+                   type="date"
+                   value={dueDateTo}
+                   onChange={(e) => setDueDateTo(e.target.value)}
+                   placeholder="ç»“æŸæ—¥æœŸ"
+                   className="w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-lg px-3 py-2 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500"
+                 />
+               </div>
+             </div>
+ 
+             {/* åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸè¿‡æ»¤ */}
+             <div>
+               <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-2">
+                 <Calendar className="inline h-4 w-4 mr-1" />
+                 åˆ›å»ºæ—¥æœŸ
+               </label>
+               <div className="space-y-2">
+                 <input
+                   type="date"
+                   value={createdFrom}
+                   onChange={(e) => setCreatedFrom(e.target.value)}
+                   placeholder="å¼€å§‹æ—¥æœŸ"
+                   className="w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-lg px-3 py-2 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500"
+                 />
+                 <input
+                   type="date"
+                   value={createdTo}
+                   onChange={(e) => setCreatedTo(e.target.value)}
+                   placeholder="ç»“æŸæ—¥æœŸ"
+                   className="w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-lg px-3 py-2 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500"
+                 />
+               </div>
+             </div>
+ 
+             {/* å¿«æ·è¿‡æ»¤å™¨ */}
+             <div className="md:col-span-2">
+               <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-2">
+                 å¿«æ·è¿‡æ»¤
+               </label>
+               <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2">
+                 <button
+                   onClick={() => {
+                     setDueDateTo(new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0])
+                     setSelectedStatus('pending')
+                   }}
+                   className="px-3 py-1 text-sm bg-red-100 text-red-700 rounded-lg hover:bg-red-200 transition-colors"
+                 >
+                   é€¾æœŸä»»åŠ¡
+                 </button>
+                 <button
+                   onClick={() => {
+                     setSelectedPriority('HIGH')
+                     setSelectedStatus('pending')
+                   }}
+                   className="px-3 py-1 text-sm bg-orange-100 text-orange-700 rounded-lg hover:bg-orange-200 transition-colors"
+                 >
+                   é«˜ä¼˜å…ˆçº§
+                 </button>
+                 <button
+                   onClick={() => {
+                     const today = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]
+                     setDueDateFrom(today)
+                     setDueDateTo(today)
+                   }}
+                   className="px-3 py-1 text-sm bg-blue-100 text-blue-700 rounded-lg hover:bg-blue-200 transition-colors"
+                 >
+                   ä»Šå¤©æˆªæ­¢
+                 </button>
+                 <button
+                   onClick={() => {
+                     const today = new Date()
+                     const oneWeekAgo = new Date(today.getTime() - 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
+                     setCreatedFrom(oneWeekAgo.toISOString().split('T')[0])
+                   }}
+                   className="px-3 py-1 text-sm bg-green-100 text-green-700 rounded-lg hover:bg-green-200 transition-colors"
+                 >
+                   æœ€è¿‘ä¸€å‘¨
+                 </button>
+               </div>
+             </div>
+           </div>
+

+             <button
+               onClick={handleClear}

+             >
+               æ¸…é™¤æ‰€æœ‰
+             </button>

+             >
+               åº”ç”¨è¿‡æ»¤å™¨
+             </button>
+           </div>
+         </div>
+       )}
+     </div>
+   )
+ }
```
